comments:
Description:
BirtException when view attached file after deploy birt in Tomcat5.5.7.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Deploy birt in Tomcat5
2. View attached file.

Result:
See captured picture.
I can not run this report in my local due to DB setting. From the attached exception seems something wrong either in report engine or dte.

Don't mind the exception thrown out. There is this exception even when result can be previewed correctly.

I run the report and find that the result can be wiewed with tomcat 4.1.* with jdk 1.4.2 or 1.5. But it can't be viewed with tomcat 5.5.12.

In all the environment, the same exception is thrown out.

This is not a app server specfic issue. I can view general reports without problem on tomcat 5.5.7.

The attached report uses a Db that I can not access. Please double check it with a report using sample db.

If the issue is only about this exception, it needs to be resolved. At least it needs to be caught and logged properly.
